zh-cn: 破除旧思想、旧文化、旧风俗、旧习惯

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国文化大革命初期，以大、中学生红卫兵为主力进行的以“破除旧思想、旧文化、旧风俗、旧习惯”为目标的社会运动。
description.en: A social movement during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution in the People's Republic of China, primarily carried out by Red Guards from high schools and universities, aimed at destroying the 'Four Olds': Old Ideas, Old Culture, Old Customs, and Old Habits.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场全国性政治运动，由毛泽东发动和领导。
description.en: A nationwide political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中国大陆对大、中学生自发成立的群众组织的统称，是“破四旧”运动的主要执行者。
description.en: A general term for mass organizations spontaneously formed by high school and university students in mainland China during the Cultural Revolution, and the main executors of the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主席，文化大革命的发动者和领导者。
description.en: Chairman of the Communist Party of China, who launched and led the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党副主席，文化大革命初期的重要领导人。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the Communist Party of China, an important leader in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1966年6月1日《人民日报》发表的社论，首次明确提出“破四旧”的概念。
description.en: An editorial published in the People's Daily on June 1, 1966, which first explicitly proposed the concept of 'Destroying the Four Olds'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会关于无产阶级文化大革命的决定

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会关于无产阶级文化大革命的决定
en: Decision of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party on the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月8日中共八届十一中全会通过的纲领性文件，肯定了“破四旧”的目标。
description.en: A programmatic document passed by the Eleventh Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the CCP on August 8, 1966, which affirmed the goal of 'Destroying the Four Olds'.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月在北京发生的一系列暴力事件，期间“破四旧”运动逐渐升级。
description.en: A series of violent events that occurred in Beijing in August 1966, during which the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement gradually escalated.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十三位皇帝。其遗骸在1966年8月被红卫兵焚毁。
description.en: The 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty. His remains were burned by Red Guards in August 1966.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 北京红卫兵“五大领袖”之一，率领红卫兵在曲阜进行了大规模的破坏活动。
description.en: One of the 'Five Great Leaders' of the Beijing Red Guards, who led Red Guards in large-scale destruction in Qufu.

en: Temple and Cemetery of Confucius and the Kong Family Mansion in Qufu

description.zh-cn: 位于山东曲阜的孔子及其家族的纪念性建筑群，在“破四旧”运动中遭到严重损毁。
description.en: A complex of commemorative buildings for Confucius and his family in Qufu, Shandong, which was severely damaged during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

description.zh-cn: 由谭厚兰等人成立的红卫兵组织，旨在“彻底捣毁孔家店”。
description.en: A Red Guard organization established by Tan Houlan and others, aiming to 'thoroughly smash the Confucian establishment'.

description.zh-cn: 位于山东省曲阜市的一所师范大学，其红卫兵参与了对“三孔”的破坏。
description.en: A normal university in Qufu, Shandong Province, whose Red Guards participated in the destruction of the 'Three Confucian sites'.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代散文家、文学理论家、评论家、翻译家，鲁迅的胞弟。在文革“破四旧”期间遭到批斗和抄家。
description.en: A modern Chinese essayist, literary theorist, critic, and translator, and the younger brother of Lu Xun. He was persecuted and his house was raided during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家，新文化运动的领袖之一。
description.en: A leading figure of modern Chinese literature and one of the leaders of the New Culture Movement.

description.zh-cn: 1966年9月5日《人民日报》发表的社论，旨在抑制“破四旧”运动中迅速升级的暴力行为。
description.en: An editorial published in the People's Daily on September 5, 1966, aimed at curbing the rapidly escalating violence in the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中国共产党的最高领导机构之一，实际取代了中央政治局和中央书记处。
description.en: One of the highest leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party during the Cultural Revolution, which effectively replaced the Politburo and the Secretariat.

nodes.id: 关于无产阶级文化大革命中保护文物图书的几点意见

zh-cn: 关于无产阶级文化大革命中保护文物图书的几点意见

description.zh-cn: 1967年5月14日由中共中央下发的文件，要求各地国家权力机关保护文物。
description.en: A document issued by the Central Committee of the CCP on May 14, 1967, requiring local state power organs to protect cultural relics.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1960年代末至1970年代末组织的知识青年到农村进行再教育的政治运动，导致了红卫兵运动的停止。
description.en: A political movement in the PRC from the late 1960s to the late 1970s that sent educated urban youth to rural areas for re-education, leading to the cessation of the Red Guard movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的思想家、教育家，儒家学派创始人。其思想和相关文物在“破四旧”中被视为主要的攻击目标。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosopher, educator, and founder of Confucianism. His ideas and related cultural relics were primary targets of attack during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

description.zh-cn: 由中华民国在台湾地区发起的文化运动，旨在反制中国大陆的“破四旧”运动。
description.en: A cultural movement initiated by the Republic of China in the Taiwan area to counter the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 1912年在中国大陆成立的共和制国家，1949年后政府迁至台湾。
description.en: A republic founded in mainland China in 1912, whose government relocated to Taiwan after 1949.

description.zh-cn: 破四旧是文化大革命初期的一场社会运动。
description.en: The Destroy the Four Olds movement was a social movement in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 红卫兵是破四旧运动的主要执行力量。
description.en: The Red Guards were the main force executing the Destroy the Four Olds movement.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在天安门多次接见红卫兵，对红卫兵运动和“破四旧”表示支持和鼓励。
description.en: Mao Zedong met with Red Guards multiple times at Tiananmen, expressing support and encouragement for the Red Guard movement and 'Destroy the Four Olds'.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在讲话中鼓动“破四旧、立四新”。
description.en: In his speeches, Lin Biao incited the 'destruction of the Four Olds and establishment of the Four News'.

description.zh-cn: 该《人民日报》社论提出了“彻底破除……旧思想、旧文化、旧风俗、旧习惯”的口号，引发了破四旧运动。
description.en: This People's Daily editorial proposed the slogan of 'thoroughly destroying... old ideas, old culture, old customs, and old habits,' triggering the Destroy the Four Olds movement.

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》于1966年6月1日发表了社论《横扫一切牛鬼蛇神》。
description.en: The People's Daily published the editorial 'Sweep Away All Ghosts and Monsters' on June 1, 1966.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会关于无产阶级文化大革命的决定

description.zh-cn: 该文件（《十六条》）明确规定“破四旧”、“立四新”是文革的重要目标。
description.en: This document (the Sixteen Points) explicitly stipulated that 'Destroying the Four Olds' and 'Establishing the Four News' were important goals of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在北京的“红八月”期间，“破四旧”运动逐渐升级。
description.en: During the 'Red August' in Beijing, the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement gradually escalated.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，北京红卫兵将明神宗与两位皇后的骸骨移至定陵外焚毁。
description.en: In August 1966, Beijing Red Guards moved the remains of the Wanli Emperor and two empresses outside the Dingling Mausoleum and burned them.

description.zh-cn: 谭厚兰率领200余名红卫兵前往曲阜，与曲阜师范学院的红卫兵共同成立了“讨孔联络站”。
description.en: Tan Houlan led over 200 Red Guards to Qufu and, together with Red Guards from Qufu Normal University, established the 'Liaison Station for Denouncing Confucius'.

position.zh-cn: 北京红卫兵“五大领袖”之一
position.en: One of the 'Five Great Leaders' of the Beijing Red Guards

description.zh-cn: 谭厚兰是北京红卫兵的五大领袖之一。
description.en: Tan Houlan was one of the five great leaders of the Beijing Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: “讨孔联络站”在曲阜严重损毁了孔庙、孔林和孔府，毁坏了大量文物、古书和石碑。
description.en: The 'Liaison Station for Denouncing Confucius' severely damaged the Temple, Cemetery, and Mansion of Confucius in Qufu, destroying a large number of cultural relics, ancient books, and stone tablets.

description.zh-cn: 在“破四旧”运动中，孔子的思想被视为封建主义的代表而受到批判，其相关文物古迹也遭到破坏。
description.en: During the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement, Confucius's ideas were criticized as representative of feudalism, and related cultural relics and historical sites were destroyed.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，周作人被红卫兵鞭打批斗，家也被多次查封和洗劫。
description.en: In August 1966, Zhou Zuoren was beaten and denounced by Red Guards, and his house was raided and sealed multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 周作人是鲁迅的胞弟。
description.en: Zhou Zuoren was Lu Xun's full younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在1966年8月31日的讲话中提出“要用文斗，不用武斗”，意图抑制运动中的暴力行为。
description.en: In his speech on August 31, 1966, Lin Biao proposed to 'use struggle by reasoning, not by coercion or force,' in an attempt to curb the violence in the movement.

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》发表社论《用文斗，不用武斗》，使得破四旧运动中迅速升级的严重暴力行为在9月初开始受到抑制。
description.en: The People's Daily published the editorial 'Use Struggle by Reasoning, Not by Coercion or Force,' which began to curb the severely escalating violence of the Destroy the Four Olds movement in early September.

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》于1966年9月5日发表了社论《用文斗，不用武斗》。
description.en: The People's Daily published the editorial 'Use Struggle by Reasoning, Not by Coercion or Force' on September 5, 1966.

relationships.source: 关于无产阶级文化大革命中保护文物图书的几点意见

description.zh-cn: 该文件要求各地保护文物，是官方制止“破四旧”中破坏文物行为的措施之一。
description.en: This document required all localities to protect cultural relics, and was one of the official measures to stop the destruction of cultural heritage during the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 关于无产阶级文化大革命中保护文物图书的几点意见

description.zh-cn: 该文件由中共中央下发。
description.en: This document was issued by the Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东发出指示“知识青年到农村去，接受贫下中农的再教育，很有必要”，开启了大规模的上山下乡运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong issued the directive 'It is highly necessary for educated youth to go to the countryside to be re-educated by the poor and lower-middle peasants,' initiating the large-scale Down to the Countryside Movement.

description.zh-cn: 上山下乡运动的开始，使得红卫兵运动逐渐停止。
description.en: The beginning of the Down to the Countryside Movement led to the gradual cessation of the Red Guard movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华文化复兴运动是中华民国方面为了反制在中国大陆发生的“破四旧”而发起的。
description.en: The Chinese Cultural Renaissance movement was initiated by the Republic of China to counter the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement happening in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在台湾地区发起了中华文化复兴运动。
description.en: The Republic of China launched the Chinese Cultural Renaissance movement in the Taiwan area.
